metadata.name: Player Stats System
metadata.description: Core player stat definitions and progression rules
metadata.author: Wayfarer Team

stats.name: Insight
stats.description: Analytical intelligence and systematic observation. Represents your ability to understand patterns, analyze situations, and apply logical reasoning.
stats.conversationBenefit: Better success with analytical and observational cards. Unlocks cards that examine evidence and identify patterns.
stats.investigationUnlock: Systematic Observation at level 2: +1 familiarity gain when investigating
stats.travelUnlock: Scholar shortcuts at level 2: Access to library passages, observatory routes, and academic pathways

stats.name: Rapport
stats.description: Emotional intelligence and empathetic connection. Represents your ability to understand feelings, build trust, and connect with others.
stats.conversationBenefit: Better success with empathetic and supportive cards. Unlocks cards that offer comfort and understanding.
stats.investigationUnlock: Local Inquiry at level 2: Learn NPC observation preferences through conversation
stats.travelUnlock: Community paths at level 2: Access to local favors, friendship routes, and neighborhood shortcuts

stats.name: Authority
stats.description: Leadership and persuasive command. Represents your ability to take charge, demand respect, and influence through presence.
stats.conversationBenefit: Better success with commanding and directive cards. Unlocks cards that establish dominance and demand compliance.
stats.investigationUnlock: Demand Access at level 2: Force entry to restricted spots through authority
stats.travelUnlock: Noble gates at level 2: Access to checkpoint bypasses, official routes, and command passages

stats.name: Commerce
stats.description: Negotiation and trade acumen. Represents your ability to identify value, negotiate deals, and think in terms of profit and exchange.
stats.conversationBenefit: Better success with negotiation and trade-focused cards. Unlocks cards that propose deals and calculate value.
stats.investigationUnlock: Purchase Information at level 2: Pay coins for instant familiarity gain
stats.travelUnlock: Merchant caravans at level 2: Access to trade routes, market passages, and commercial transport

stats.name: Cunning
stats.description: Subtlety and indirect influence. Represents your ability to work in shadows, find alternative angles, and achieve goals through misdirection.
stats.conversationBenefit: Better success with subtle and indirect cards. Unlocks cards that hint, deflect, and work around obstacles.
stats.investigationUnlock: Covert Search at level 2: Investigate without alerting NPCs or drawing attention
stats.travelUnlock: Shadow paths at level 3: Access to hidden routes, thief passages, and underground networks

levelBonuses.description: +5% success rate to all cards of this stat
